header.title: Welcome
header.subtitle: We provide technology since 2005
header.description: Creating an app, a website, and a system to manage and promote your business is the key to success. With the digitalization of the economy, we are all connected. Ignoring this means leaving space for competitors. F5 Sites is a Brazilian company just arrived in Italy, ready to bring competitive advantages to Italian businesses at a low cost. Want to discuss how to digitize your business?

products.title: F5 Sites Products
products.subtitle: We launch and develop our products.
products.lavaggioapp: Car wash delivery app for Italy market

react.title: React
react.description: A complete framework for building modern, user-friendly web applications, integrated with external APIs and WordPress.

docker.title: Docker
docker.description: Solutions for deploying your website and applications on any cloud infrastructure.

restApi.title: Rest API
restApi.description: WordPress provides a REST layer to facilitate the interaction between businesses and their applications.

featureSection.title: Features
featureSection.subtitle: You decide: we do.
featureSection.robustProjectsDescription: The quality of code translates into ease of adapting the product to our clients' needs.
featureSection.customDescription: Features created specifically for your business, tailor-made.
featureSection.smartDescription: The ability of an application to anticipate and predict user needs.
featureSection.innovativeDescription: Modern screen quality for the most demanding users.
featureSection.pwaDescription: It is native and available in the Google and Apple stores but can also be accessed from the browser.
featureSection.creativeDesignDescription: Creation of exclusive and original screens for your project.

questionSection.lavaggioAppDescription: We are launching a subscription service for self-car wash. It consists of two apps, one for the customer and one for the partner, like Uber. Our main technological project for the Italian market.
questionSection.manualWashDescription: The hand wash service at home is designed to offer convenience and quality. We use special techniques to ensure thorough cleaning of each garment. We handle pick-up and delivery, all without you having to leave your home.
questionSection.downloadAndBookDescription: Download our app and book the service in just a few clicks. Easily schedule your delivery.
questionSection.exclusiveAIForSectorTitle: Creating Exclusive AI for the Sector
questionSection.exclusiveAIForSectorDescription: We are creating an exclusive AI for the car wash sector, designed to accurately assess the quality of the process and ensure results for each treated garment.
questionSection.madeInItalyDescription: We are immensely proud to develop an app here in Italy. Every line of code, every feature is crafted with the passion and quality that define "Made in Italy" ðŸ‡®ðŸ‡¹. We are creating something unique, rooted in our tradition of excellence, to offer the world an innovative and authentically Italian product.
